remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來提供事件的值給事件和可讓您指定自訂的 Windows 身分識別目前的要求。The class is used to supply event values to the event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request. 您可以存取事件的類別，藉由指定名為副程式**AnonymousIdentification_Creating** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案中。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 建構物件使用目前並將它傳遞給**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。The constructs a object using the current and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event. 您可以使用的屬性物件提供給**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件設定為某個自訂值的匿名識別項。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value. 如果您未指定的值期間的屬性**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，用。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a is used. **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**匿名識別時，才會引發事件。The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when the anonymous identification is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件設定為某個自訂值的匿名識別項。The following code example uses the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]
